text:
<@U01QVR44MEY> Finally got an answer from HS support :disappointed:
> Thank you for your message! Ryan, I have talked to the team, and they had explained that any new KB that you create are still being created under the old experience; your portal is not currently enabled for the new KB experience yet until the team can complete the migration tool.
> I hope I could clarify this topic for you. Have a great day!
... and "the new KB experience" is required to enable graphql against the KB dataset...
Really annoying if you ask me
BUT... I have "the next experience" in a test portal, so I'm going to try there.
